title: Epic Amazon sale has Blink home security camera deals starting at just $24.99
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Record-low prices on Amazon's Blink home security cameras
article: Secure your home and save money from today's Amazon sale, which includes incredible deals on the Blink home security camera. You can score record-low prices on the Blink indoor and outdoor security cameras and the all-new Blink Mini.
